name: Umbral Scion
prerequisiteFormula: all(@cha_score >= 13, @wis_score >= 13, @feat:drow_nobility, @feat:greater_drow_nobility, @feat:improved_drow_nobility, "Able to use drow spell-like abilities", @race:drow)

description.text: New spell-like abilities are unlocked for you as you rise to ascendency among the drow people.

sections.Benefit: Select one of the following: dispel magic, divine favor, or suggestion. You may use this spell once per day as a spell-like ability. Your caster level is equal to your character level.
